entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update .NET Linux Build for .NET 10 #109939
  • [Wasm] WasmAppHost should not force COOP/COEP when not using threading #109937
  • Increase in unmanaged memory growth when upgrading from .NET 6 to 8 #109933
  • Include list of processes that have the file open in IOException message on Windows #109927
  • .NET SDK 8.0.404 ignores `<EnablePreviewFeatures>True` in dotnet build #109926
  • What is the license for the dotnet/dotnet build prerequisites called Private.SourceBuilt.Artifacts? #109923
  • Infinite loop in EventLogWatcher class #109908
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables.Test.EnvironmentVariablesTest.BindingDoesNotThrowIfReloadedDuringBinding #109904
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: CoreMangLib/system/enum/EnumIConvertibleToUint64/EnumIConvertibleToUint64.cmd #109902

Closed

  • ARM64 SVE: mask conversion not always optimised away #108241
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] AccessViolationException when making reflection calls over DIMs #109893
    9.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] export for android cannot work #109713
  • Possible System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource trimming issue #109872
    8.0.x
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.cmd #109905
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_InstanceMethods_DefaultTimeout_SourceGenerated_Throws #109903
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'newLayoutCost < currLayoutCost' during 'Optimize layout' in libraries-jitstress #109831
    10.0.0
  • NET 9 Regression: Razor Source Generator False IL2111 Warning with DynamicComponent #109916
  • Application Build with sdk .NET9 were not working in Azure app service(Linux) #109867
  • AD lookup of GetGroup will return exception after migration to .net 9 #109911
  • ARM64-SVE: Detect mask usage for Across functions #101973
    10.0.0
  • [QUIC] Migrate OSX build into MsQuic #101590
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Test failed: System.Threading.Tests.SynchronizationContextTests.WaitNotificationTest #31977
  • AF: ILC: Assertion failed '((simdSize == 16) && compOpportunisticallyDependsOn(InstructionSet_SSE41)) || ((simdSize == 32) && compOpportunisticallyDependsOn(InstructionSet_AVX2))' #109760
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Set RejitFlags to use a known underlying type #109935
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update TagName docs to include behavior if tag is not found #109934
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix output directory for cross compilers if OutputRID is overridden #109932
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix attribute spelling in resx #109929
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for MacCatalyst/iOS simulator #109928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] `TensorPrimitives` XML docs: `MinNumber`/`ReciprocalSqrt`/`ReciprocalSqrtEstimate` oversights #109922
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #109920
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Run downlevel tests only on main #109919
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #109918
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move ReflectionCoreCallbacks into ReflectionAugments #109912
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix obtaining type handles of IDynamicInterfaceCastableImplementation #109909
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add configuration variables. #109907
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add Linux build methodology doc #109938
    area-Meta
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add regression test for a default interface method issue #109917
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Relax cost improvement assert in 3-opt layout #109835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Docs updates #109808
    needs-area-label
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Delete dead link in RD.XML docs #109910
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove more HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection #109882
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [WASI] Skip signal handler registration on WASI #109838
    arch-wasm, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Avoid SerialPort IOLoop when there's no event handlers #102829
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Ensure that MultiplyAddEstimate exits for cases where GT_MUL is unsupported #109842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109841
    area-System.Threading
  • Add numerical ordering option for string comparison operations #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix failing test on NativeAOT #109853
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Update ApiCompatNetCoreAppBaselineVersion to 9.0.0 #109790
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix dataflow analysis for GetNestedType #109814
    new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Continue profile consistency checks until after finally cloning #109792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Re-enable skiasharp WBT tests #109232
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Unhandled exception handler. #109806
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove switch recognition fallthrough quirk #109796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add left-handed spherical and cylindrical billboards #109605
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [EventTrace] Update check for provider triggered GC #109587
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: Unroll more Equals/StartsWith/EndsWith on arm64 #109036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `unsafe` modifier from `Memory<T>.Span` #106085
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Disable some chrome-DebuggerTests that are crashing with DeadLetter #109871
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Propagate static readonly loads by value during inlining #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: (x u>> cns) -> [0..(x's max value >> cns)] #109900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Add SseFormatter #109832
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Fix BCE regression #109466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Proposed fix for issue XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] JIT: Use ABI names for floating registers #109728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #109891
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • fix(wasm): proper library detection for browserwasm and wasi #109866
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [WASI] throw PNSE in `ManualResetEventSlim.Wait` #109839
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, community-contribution, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Improved the test coverage of XmlWriter. #107680
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Only build cdac-build-tool when we need to build runtime #109719
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 131.0.6778.69, windows: 131.0.6778.70 #109895
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove unsafe perf quirks from System.Text.Encodings.Web #109896
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109648
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #109732
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix regression in constructor parameter binding logic. #109813
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    area-System.Runtime, os-windows-nano, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Re-enable the `SharedLibrary` test for WASI P2 #2648

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Update macos version #2788
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add WasmExternalDwarf property to create an external_debug_info section #2786
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Automate `WasmDebugging.csproj` via LLDB scripting #2785
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • awaits of Task-returning methods from async2 are done as thunk calls. #2781
    area-async
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] update `SharedLibrary` smoke test for WASIp2 #2778
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] `UseAppHost: false` for the HelloWorld sample #2782
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • Status and incomplete fat `Precode` pointer. #2780
    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • [SwiftBindings] Binding process doc #2779
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM AOT segfault in wasm-opt on linux-musl-x64 when FSharp.Core is referenced #44933
  • .NET9 MAUI sample App build crash on C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk\9.0.100\Sdks\Microsoft.NET.Sdk\targets\Microsoft.NET.Sdk.FrameworkReferenceResolution.targets(494,7) #44919
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44915

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][intermittent]Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." When running the command quickly. #41588
    10.0.1xx
  • Deduplicate NuGet sources provided from NuGet.Config and .NET CLI arguments for tool install #43507
    10.0.1xx
  • Warnings about transitive dependency vulnerabilities when using .NET 9 SDK #44929
  • Workload instalation doesn't respect rollback file #27402
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [CP to release/9.0.2xx] Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Undo 10.0 sdk workarounds and re-enable scenario-tests #44937
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround for MSbuildProjectLoader.LoadProjectInfoAsync throwing on unrecognized project language #44928
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround for MSBuildProjectLoader.LoadProjectInfoAsync throwing on unrecognized project language #44927
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [VMR] Enable building Mono Cross AOT verticals #44924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove `global::` from generated global usings #44916
    untriaged, Area-ImplicitUsings
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Work around concurrency issue in COM API #44930
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update implicit versions and to GA #44834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool-install: Avoid duplicate sources #44853
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Remove the 9.0 template #44780
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up namespaces #44691
    untriaged
  • Distribute 9.0 stable packs in 10.0 SDK #44918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #44887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable sourcebuild repo leg #44286
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Factor Hot Reload agent implementation into a source package #44899
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP - Add fantomas formatting support #44801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2584386 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove 6 from the branch codeflow #44829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Apply xunit configuration to all tests for better test failure diagnostics #44907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Enhanced switch statments #8611
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Block-bodied switch expression arms #8610
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: `using` with a discard #8606
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: never/bottom type #8604
    Backlog

Closed

  • Proposal: Enhanced switch statements #3038
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Block-bodied switch expression arms #3037
    Working Set
  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog
  • Champion "User-defined Positional Patterns" #1047
    Backlog
  • Proposal: never/bottom type #538
    Backlog
  • DIM proposal spec lists `override` allowed where it is not actually allowed. #4353
  • Records: Metadata determination of whether a type is a record #4121
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Spec updates #8609

Merged

  • Dictionary expressions: add rules for type inference and overload resolution #8598

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Surprising semantic model and IOp behavior around nullable. #75964
  • Fix `Move misplaced using directives` breaks symbol qualification #75961
  • Test Plan for Runtime Async #75960
  • SourceLink returning incorrect PDB info #75959
  • MSbuildProjectLoader.LoadProjectInfoAsync should allow skipping unrecognized projects #75956
  • CS8604 FP with static partial class #75954
  • Abstract `Equals` on record causes "BadImageFormatException" #75957

Closed

  • [LSP] All requests for opened source generated documents fail #60434
    Backlog
  • Revise current experimental code-style options and promote them to be non-experimental #60539
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer.UnitTests.DocumentChanges.DocumentChangesTests.DidCloseWithoutDidOpen_Errors is Flakey #60476
    Backlog
  • New files, members are not recognized after git pull #75495
  • "Remove redundant assignment" removes unrelated code #72829
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Close stale PRs #75963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update language feature status #75962
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not pay attention to Overload Resolution Priority for properties assigned in attributes #75958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Fix switch indentation for list patterns #75953
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Improve performance on `SymbolCompletionProviderTests` #75496
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main into VBOverloadResolutionPriority #75955
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle `using var` in redundant assignment removal #75952
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • VB Overload Resolution Priority - handle operators and respect language version #75941
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Include list of processes that lock file in `can't write file` error message #75946
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations by creating an array builder class that allows span usage #75940
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Clear hoisted locals when disposing iterator and async-iterator state machines #75908
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Null-conditional assignment 1 #75821
    Area-Compilers, VSCode, New Feature - Null Conditional Assignment, 17.13 P2

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Include javascript files associated with Blazor components when using MapStaticAssets #59038
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #59030
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #59029
  • Best place to store SQLite database file for Blazor app running on Azure App Service? #59028
  • Hot reloading fails after the second change of a razor file #59027
  • build Asp.net core 8.0.1 some errors #59025
  • Dotnet watch falls over frequently with "An item with the same key has already been added" #59018
  • [Regression] .NET 9 ILLinker trims out `ControllerContext` setter out of `ControllerBase` #59039
  • Perf regression: json, updates #59017
  • SignalR - Ability to run middleware before the hub dispatcher #59015
  • Razor Class Library Build Time Serious Regression with .NET 9 SDK #59014
    9.0.x
  • generate openapi json error when custom IBindingSourceMetadata #59013
    10.0-preview1

Closed

  • Package microsoft.aspnetcore.components.customelements/9.0.0 is missing tsconfig.json #59026
  • Perf improvement: json #59016
  • [.NET 9] BlazorWebView fails to load on older Android devices `Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token .` #53699
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Performance Regression in Blazor WebAssembly with .NET 9 #58507
  • Static Web Assets with Finger Printing in Razor Class Libraries not supported? #58976
  • Not found routes causes Blazor WASM to reload. #58834
  • Interactable UI During Exporting in Blazor WebAssembly #58836

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't run IIS websocket tests on unsupported queue #59036
    area-networking
  • Don't throw exception for parameters with custom binding source #59035
    area-mvc
  • Bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.6 #59034
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1204d63` to `d144031` #59033
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `d144031` #59032
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x

Merged

  • ContinueOnError in windows local development job #59037
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • nit: doc comment typo #58945
    community-contribution, area-security, 10.0-preview1
  • Upload test logs for local validation job #59031
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24560.6 #58862
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Hot Reload agent improvements #58333
    area-blazor
  • Re-enable benchmark validation for HttpSys, gRPC #58923
    area-grpc
  • Put package assets in TFM-specific folder #58995
    area-mvc
  • Add pre-commit hook with code formatting #58965
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix XmlDocs for StaticAssetsEndpointRouteBuilderExtensions MapStaticAssets #58905
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BindingContext Not Propagated Correctly to ContentView When ControlTemplate Changes at Runtime #25934
  • DisplayPromptAsync does not accept Enter Key Press from scanner data read #25932
  • Preferences DateTime Storage Issues #25930
  • Unpackaged windows build does not include font resources #25929
  • There is a rogue FluentUI.cs in Resources/Fonts #25928
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Investigate if we can improve the error handling experience for .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid apps #25927
    Backlog
  • [Android] External keyboard moves focus with Enter between entries #25926
    Backlog
  • [WINDOWS] Setting BackgroundColor for Slider updates the Maximum Track Color #25921
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI set AppShell custom FlyoutIcon displayed problem #25920
  • [Windows] - Top Tab Visibility Changes Not Reflected Until Tab Switch #25913
    Backlog
  • [9.0] [iOS] [Regression] - ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always white. #25912
    .NET 9 SR2

Closed

  • MAUI ios application build fails with clang error code 137 #25607
  • Visual Studio 17.12 and .NET 8 requires XCode 16 #25888
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.RoundRectangle has been Garbage Collected #25716
  • .Net 8/ 9 Memory leaks #25425
    Backlog
  • App crashes when navigating from TabbedPage to another TabbedPage #22131
    Backlog
  • [Windows]Repeated navigation page crash #18441
    Backlog
  • VS upgrade to 17.12 fails to recognize iOS simulators from XCode 16.1 #25904
  • Flyout Menu Icon Changes to 'Back' Icon When Flyout Appears #25809
  • .NET MAUI BLAZOR v.8 unable connect to the api with the http url #25901
  • MAUI Blazor in .NET 9 does not run on Android API level 31 and below #25862
  • Span with tail truncation and paragraph breaks with Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException #25836
    Backlog
  • [BUG] Memory Leak using SkiaBitmapExportContext #25881
  • App will not install on device with Sign in with Apple capability in the provisioning profile and com.apple.developer.applesignin key is in Entitlements.plist after publishing. #25923
  • Page.IsBusy activity idicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23674
    Backlog
  • AccurracyBestForNavigation is misspelled #25844
  • "ObjectDisposedException" When Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically #25724
    Backlog
  • OnNavigatingFrom called even if not navigating back on swipe in IOS #25699
  • Can't install on device w/ 9.0.100 but 9.0.0-rc.2 works #25860
  • XAML loader fails after new element added in project #25705
  • Changing visibility in child elements does not work #25154

PullRequests

Created

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241118221232126 to main #25933
    area-infrastructure
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 #25925
    area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly - test fix #25924
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25919
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 12 #25917
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [ci] Bump branding for sr2 #25915
    area-infrastructure
  • [Testing] Changes in randomly failing UITests #25914
    area-testing

Merged

  • [Android] Span with tail truncation and paragraph breaks with Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - fix #25892
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly #25545
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Revert "Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly" #25922
  • [Android] Page.IsBusy activity indicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23745
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • Differentiate app icon & splash screen colors for sample content template #25839
    area-templates
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 10 #25847
    area-testing, community ✨

    community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing

  • [Testing] More Appium actions #25886
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement PressEnter Appium action in Catalyst #25854
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795

  • [Windows] Fix select-all Entry select logic #23329
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-entry
  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Relative source binding for gradient stop fix #20287
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages #25740

  • [Android] Input transparent for a content page #25104

  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common (= 4.8.0)" conflicts with other packages using newer versions. #35143
  • EF Core 9 generates incorrect compiled models for enum sentinel values #35142
  • Error when filtered include is used on owned entities #35135
    Backlog
  • efcore9: Migration with .Sql that suppresses a transaction logs an error even though it works #35133
  • Error in Generated Migration Script for dotnet-ef 8.0.11 #35132

Closed

  • InMemory database context with CustomWebApplicationFactory is giving double database context registration error. How do I implement this correctly? #35126
  • I encountered an error when using the left join with three queryables. #35131
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Cosmos "/id" does not match after upgrade to EF 9 #35130

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 9.0.0 to 9.1.0 #35141
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 8.0.10 to 9.0.0 #35140
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.45.0 to 3.45.2 #35139
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35138

Merged

  • Set <LangVersion> to preview #35121
  • Partial fix to #35053 - Is EF9 slower than EF8? #35128

Updated

  • Add missing Converts when simplifying in funcletizer #35122
  • Fix TPC equality check inside subquery predicate #35120
